exception.name: ErrorUnexportedLogMessages
exception.description: This exception is thrown if deletion of data from the storage failed because the storage contains log messages that have not been exported.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorUnexportedLogMessages that is thrown if deletion of data from the storage failed because the storage contains log messages that have not been exported.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when attempting to delete unexported log messages
